author: Global News
title: Ground News - Calgarian’s body pulled from Bow River after falling into water on Christmas Day near Morley Bridge
text:
Summary by Global News A 61-year-old Calgary man is dead after falling into the Bow River near Mînî Thnî, formerly known as Morley, on Christmas Day. His body was recovered on Boxing Day. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Global News Lean Left High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Corus Entertainment Calgarian’s body pulled from Bow River after falling into water on Christmas Day near Morley Bridge A 61-year-old Calgary man is dead after falling into the Bow River near Mînî Thnî, formerly known as Morley, on Christmas Day. His body was recovered on Boxing Day.
